CustomField.description: To accommodate process of auto-creation of new records and Assignment date for previously un-registered records and still give a 'deadline' for processing and therefore the ability to prioritise records
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Auto-populated when a record is auto-created 12 months before the expiry date of the previous record or populated by the team when a new registration starts
CustomField.label: Assignment date/Previous reg expiry
